item.title: Amsterdam Data Science Thesis Award
item.description: For my BSc Computer Science Thesis I received the Inaugural Amsterdam Data Science Thesis award. The thesis was completed in 2020 at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam with @Large Massivizing Computer Systems research group. The full thesis is available here and more information on the Amsterdam Data Science award can be found here.
